name: Gflop
description:
A small project I made in 2016 with two other people as part of my Games Development Degree. A one-button platformer game where you switch the direction of gravity in order to dodge past obstacles and eventually reach the end of the level. Has a bonus infinite runner mode as well!

Controls: Press Spacebar to switch from sliding on the floor to sliding on the ceiling.

Credits go to Lukas Haak and Hussein Hassain for working with me on this project. We all made one level each and Lukas programmed the infinite level.

Soundtracks - All royalty free:

LukHash - Round The World
Lyvo - your love
Thoribass - Sunrise (mastered)
Eve Catani - Fizzlenizzle
BitBurner - But Mom
BitBurner - We Get Mental
